name: RN apps: iOS ONLY - Inline image with size specified

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)

inline.description:
Inline image with size specified
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Post the link in the text data field where the resolution has been appended
    Note: okay to post on browser and view on mobile app
inline.expectedResult:
• Image displays
  • On RN, can tap image to open in previewer

    Note: The image may be slow to appear when tapped on in iOS or may not show at all.
    MM-25811 has been filed to address this.

customFields.Related ticket(s):
• (Story) Webapp: Allow in-line markdown images to open preview window — MM-12898
  • (Queued) In-line markdown image tap to open in preview leads to black screen. — MM-25811
  • Inline images from markdown still show markdown above the image — MM-31228
customFields.Important notes about this step: You can find test files here: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1xGCy3tp9A_WxOfdgAzBHzrqJ1WCyfSjW
